title: Explosive Cigars for Chinese New Year
itunes:title: Explosive Cigars for Chinese New Year
description:
The week LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage… Although the Groundhog saw his shadow meaning there are 6 more weeks of winter, It is The Chinese New Year and that means it is over! With lots of snow this week… We will be the judge of that! Stand by for an explosive show.

In the first hour we smoke the Black Bomb which was included in the Care Package as we look at the Chinese New Year and the many traditions around it. We also look at the many cigars that have been made in celebration of the holiday.

In the second hour we talk about the Super Bowl. It’s the Kid vs the GOAT. We talk about the cigars we are going to smoke during the game, what we will eat, and who will win while we smoke another cigar from the Care Package, Don Rafael.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

As always you can find many of the cigars we smoke at https://www.2guyscigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
